languages.text: "Прошу, сдержи свою жажду крови — пока я с тобой, нам ничего не угрожает".
"Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."
languages.original_text: "Прошу, сдержи свою жажду крови — пока я с тобой, нам ничего не угрожает".

traits.locale_text: "Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."
"Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."
"Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."
"Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."

languages.text: 「血を渇望する心は抑えてもらおう。我らが共にいる間は、何者にも脅かされることはない」
languages.original_text: "Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."

traits.locale_text: 「血を渇望する心は抑えてもらおう。我らが共にいる間は、何者にも脅かされることはない」

languages.text: “请克制你嗜血的欲望。只要我在你身边，就没有任何事情能威胁到我们。”
languages.original_text: "Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."

traits.locale_text: “请克制你嗜血的欲望。只要我在你身边，就没有任何事情能威胁到我们。”

languages.text: «Contén tu sed de sangre. Mientras esté contigo, no hay ninguna amenaza para nosotros».
languages.original_text: "Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."

traits.locale_text: «Contén tu sed de sangre. Mientras esté contigo, no hay ninguna amenaza para nosotros».

languages.text: "Bitte zügelt Euren Blutdurst – solange ich bei Euch bin, wird uns nichts bedrohen."
languages.original_text: "Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte zügelt Euren Blutdurst – solange ich bei Euch bin, wird uns nichts bedrohen."

languages.text: « Modérez votre agressivité. Tant que je suis avec vous, nous ne risquons rien. »
languages.original_text: "Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."

traits.locale_text: « Modérez votre agressivité. Tant que je suis avec vous, nous ne risquons rien. »

languages.text: "Ne olursun kana susamışlığını bastır. Ben seninleyken hiçbir şey bize tehlike teşkil etmeyecek."
languages.original_text: "Please restrain your bloodlust — while I am with you, nothing will threaten us."

traits.locale_text: "Ne olursun kana susamışlığını bastır. Ben seninleyken hiçbir şey bize tehlike teşkil etmeyecek."
